#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int n,m,i,j,k,count=0,max=0,l;
	char c;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	char s1[n],s2[m];
	c=getchar();
	gets(s1);
	gets(s2);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=m && k<=n;j++)
		{
			k=i;l=j;
            count=0;
			while(s1[k]==s2[l])
            {
               ++k;
               ++l;
               ++count;
             }
			   if(max<count)
			    max=count;
			    count=0;
		}
	}
	printf("%d",max);
	return 0;
}
